kusarigama.name: Kusarigama
kusarigama.special: Can grapple at range; SPD check (Diff 25) to pull target 10 ft.

claw-sickle.name: Claw Sickle
claw-sickle.special: Light weapon; can attack twice for 5 AP total.

weighted-meteor-hammer.name: Weighted Meteor Hammer
weighted-meteor-hammer.special: Target makes GRT check (Diff 30) or is knocked Prone.

heavy-war-hammer.name: Heavy War Hammer
heavy-war-hammer.special: Ignores 5 points of damage reduction. Two-handed.

type-xx.name: Type XX
type-xx.special: Heavy blade; -1 D20 on attack, +1D6 damage.

wakizashi.name: Wakizashi
wakizashi.special: Quick draw; first attack in combat costs -1 AP.

falcata.name: Falcata
falcata.special: Curved blade; +2 damage against unarmored targets.

boot-knife.name: Boot Knife
boot-knife.special: Concealable; can be drawn as free action.

stiletto.name: Stiletto
stiletto.special: Armor piercing; ignores 3 points of damage reduction.

throwing-knife.name: Throwing Knife
throwing-knife.special: Draw and throw costs 2 AP total.

throwing-star.name: Throwing Star
throwing-star.special: Draw and throw costs 2 AP total.

bowie-knife.name: Bowie Knife
bowie-knife.special: Utility blade; +1 D20 on survival checks.

battle-axe.name: Battle Axe
battle-axe.special: Brutal; on crit, add an additional 5 D20 damage that additional damage is not doubled.

tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
tomahawk.special: Draw and throw for this balanced axe costs 1 AP.

glaive.name: Glaive
glaive.special: Sweeping; can hit two adjacent targets within 5 feet of each other for damage. Both targets make a defensive roll before damage is dealt.

pike.name: Pike
pike.special: Set against charge; double damage for charging enemies.

quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
quarterstaff.special: +1 D20 on defensive rolls; non-lethal damage option.

mace.name: Mace
mace.special: Crushing; ignores 2 points of damage reduction.

morningstar.name: Morningstar
morningstar.special: Spiked; on hit of 5+ over defense, add Bleeding.

brass-knuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
brass-knuckles.special: Unarmed enhancement; stacks with Martial Arts focus.

shortbow.name: Shortbow
shortbow.special: Light; can move and fire in same turn.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.special: Two-handed; requires MIT 15+ to use effectively.

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.special: Reload costs 2 AP; ignores 3 points of damage reduction.

broken-bottle.name: Broken Bottle
broken-bottle.special: Single use; shatters on hit. Causes Bleeding.

chair-leg.name: Chair Leg
chair-leg.special: Breaks on roll of 1-2 on damage dice.

bar-stool.name: Bar Stool
bar-stool.special: Unwieldy; -1 D20 on attack. Breaks after 3 hits.

colt-m1911.name: Colt M1911
colt-m1911.special: 7-round magazine. Stopping power; target makes GRT check (Diff 25) or loses 1 AP next turn.

smith-wesson-model-10.name: Smith & Wesson Model 10
smith-wesson-model-10.special: 6-round cylinder. Reliable; no jam on critical failure. Reload costs 3 AP.

colt-detective-special.name: Colt Detective Special
colt-detective-special.special: 6-round cylinder. Concealable; +1 D20 on surprise attacks. Snub nose; -1D4 beyond 20 ft.

walther-ppk.name: Walther PPK
walther-ppk.special: 7-round magazine. Compact and elegant; concealable. +1 D20 on intimidation when holstered.

browning-hi-power.name: Browning Hi-Power
browning-hi-power.special: 13-round magazine. High capacity; reload costs 2 AP.

colt-single-action-army.name: Colt Single Action Army
colt-single-action-army.special: 6-round cylinder. Classic; +1 D20 intimidation. Slow reload; 1 AP per round loaded.

derringer.name: Derringer
derringer.special: 2-round capacity. Easily hidden; draw as free action. -1 D20 beyond 10 ft.

luger-p08.name: Luger P08
luger-p08.special: 8-round magazine. Precise; +1 D20 on called shots. May jam on critical failure.

kalapraea-fans-of-battle.name: Kalaprae's Fans of Battle
kalapraea-fans-of-battle.special: Performance weapon; +1 D20 when outnumbered. Can deflect ranged attacks (SPD check Diff 25).
kalapraea-fans-of-battle.notes: The Artful Performer's influence flows through weapons that transform violence into art.

kalapraea-dancing-blade.name: Kalaprae's Dancing Blade
kalapraea-dancing-blade.special: Graceful; attacks count as performance. +1D6 damage for each consecutive hit on same target.

kalapraea-ribboned-whip.name: Kalaprae's Ribboned Whip
kalapraea-ribboned-whip.special: Mesmerizing; target makes COR check (Diff 30) or gains Entranced for 1 round.

splinter-of-kalapraea-canvas.name: Splinter of Kalaprae's Canvas
splinter-of-kalapraea-canvas.special: Wounds leave colorful marks. Marked targets take +1D4 damage from all sources.

nimietara-hoarding-blade.name: Nimietara's Hoarding Blade
nimietara-hoarding-blade.special: Greedy; heals wielder 1D4 HP per kill. Wielder feels compelled to loot fallen enemies.
nimietara-hoarding-blade.notes: The Queen of Abundance's hunger permeates these weapons, granting them an insatiable appetite for consumption.

nimietara-devouring-maw.name: Nimietara's Devouring Maw
nimietara-devouring-maw.special: Hungry; on crit, absorbs target's weapon (destroyed). +1D6 damage per weapon absorbed (max 3).

shard-of-endless-want.name: Shard of Endless Want
shard-of-endless-want.special: Insatiable; damage increases by +1 each consecutive round in combat (resets on rest).

nimietara-collectors-bow.name: Nimietara's Collector's Bow
nimietara-collectors-bow.special: Acquisitive; arrows return to quiver. +1D4 damage vs. targets carrying valuable items.

inrashu-servants-edge.name: Inrashu's Servant's Edge
inrashu-servants-edge.special: Devoted; +2D6 damage when defending an ally. -1D4 damage when fighting alone.
inrashu-servants-edge.notes: The Subservient King delights in empowering others, and his weapons reflect this generous nature.

inrashu-empty-hand.name: Inrashu's Empty Hand
inrashu-empty-hand.special: Selfless; can transfer up to 20 HP to ally as 2 AP action. Unarmed attacks deal +1D6.

pilgrims-walking-staff.name: Pilgrim's Walking Staff
pilgrims-walking-staff.special: Humble; +1 D20 on all checks when wielder has less than half HP. Non-lethal option.

inrashu-gift-unasked.name: Inrashu's Gift Unasked
inrashu-gift-unasked.special: Generous; always returns. If given freely to another, grants them +5 to all modifiers for 1 hour.

inishi-masterwork-blade.name: Inishi's Masterwork Blade
inishi-masterwork-blade.special: Perfect craft; cannot break. +1D8 damage vs. constructs and crafted creatures.
inishi-masterwork-blade.notes: The Determined Artisan whispers blueprints to master craftspeople, and the weapons that emerge from these divine collaborations are things of impossible perfection.

inishi-forge-hammer.name: Inishi's Forge Hammer
inishi-forge-hammer.special: Creator's tool; doubles as crafting implement. Items repaired with this gain +5 HP permanently.

inishi-precision-chisel.name: Inishi's Precision Chisel
inishi-precision-chisel.special: Artisan's eye; ignores all damage reduction. Critical hits leave permanent scars.

apprentices-first-blade.name: The Apprentice's First Blade
apprentices-first-blade.special: Growing craft; gains +1 permanent damage for every 10 enemies defeated (max +5).

varinalum-sealing-blade.name: Varinalum's Sealing Blade
varinalum-sealing-blade.special: Final word; kills cannot be resurrected by any means. Wounds cannot be healed for 1 hour.
varinalum-sealing-blade.notes: The Eternal Sentinel embodies the wisdom of knowing when something is complete.

varinalum-guardian-spear.name: Varinalum's Guardian Spear
varinalum-guardian-spear.special: Eternal watch; wielder cannot be moved involuntarily. +2 D20 when protecting a location.

shard-of-perfect-stillness.name: Shard of Perfect Stillness
shard-of-perfect-stillness.special: Preserving; target hit must make DET check (Diff 35) or cannot use abilities for 2 rounds.

varinalum-wardens-shield.name: Varinalum's Warden's Shield
varinalum-wardens-shield.special: Immutable; +3 D20 on defensive rolls. Once per combat, negate one attack completely.

flappers-fan.name: Flapper's Fan
flappers-fan.special: Spend 1 additional AP to add 1 D20 to your attack role

clawed-rings.name: Clawed Rings
clawed-rings.special: Re-roll your Attack Roll on first attack failure of combat
